Greeting_04:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:SurpriseM_00>Oh!<sp:5:0:0> Why did you bother coming here in
all this rain? <sp:5:0:0>You that interested in the
view, huh?
Talk_11:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Have you seen the <clr:0000>ring-shaped ruins<clr:ffff> on
the horizon? <sp:5:0:0>They're off to the southeast.

But when I'm looking out that way, I'm
thinking of what's beyond the ruinsâ€”
my dear <clr:0000>Hateno Village<clr:ffff>.
So, I'm keeping watch for monsters, of
course, but I also keep <clr:0000>seeing those
strange ruins<clr:ffff>...
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Tired_01>Which then leads me to worry more about
my family, who I left behind so I could
help out here...
<clr:0200><sp:0:2:2:5000>Tamana... Teebo... <sp:5:0:0>Please be all right...<sp:0:2:2:6400><clr:ffff>
Talk_19:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think>Huh? Just now, I saw something moving
over at Hyrule Castle... Can't be... I must
have imagined it.
Talk_06:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>You're a curious one, being up here
when everyone's down below.<sp:5:0:0>
The name's Thadd.
I'm from a place that's almost as far
to the <clr:0000>southeast<clr:ffff> as you can get from
here. It's called <clr:0000>Hateno Village<clr:ffff>.
I've been worried about my family back
home. So if you catch me sneaking a
peek thataway, <sp:5:0:0>well, that's why.
Talk_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:QuestionNormal_00>I know you...<sp:5:1:0>


<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseM_01>You're that Link fellow, aren't you!


What are you doing over here?! Go find
<clr:0000>Purah<clr:ffff> right away!
Greeting_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>You're back? You that interested in the
view, huh?
Talk_07:
<sp:0:2:2:7d00><sp:3:0:2:0b00>Gah!<sp:0:2:2:6400>


I was NOT just gazing off toward my
hometown. Of course not. I'm on the
lookout for monsters.
...


<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Problem is, when I keep watch from
here, I see the<clr:0000> ring-shaped ruins<clr:ffff> in
the distance.
Just so happens that <clr:0000>Hateno Village<clr:ffff> is
out that way, beyond the horizon.

<clr:0200><sp:0:2:2:5000>Tamana... Teebo... Tell me you're all right...<sp:0:2:2:6400><clr:ffff>
Talk_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Notice_01>You know <clr:0000>Purah<clr:ffff> will want to see that
you're actually back, right? Don't waste
time talking to me. Go find her!
Talk_08:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>My village is indebted to Princess Zelda.


I wanted to offer some kind of assistance
in return, so I came here.

<sp:3:0:2:0c00>But I'm worried sick about my wife and
son back in <clr:0000>Hateno Village<clr:ffff>...

That's far beyond those <clr:0000>ring-shaped
ruins<clr:ffff> in the distance, so I keep looking
out that way.
<sp:3:0:2:0b01>But I'm keeping proper watch, don't
you worry!
